# Available QML modules

The following modules are bundled with Pegasus, and can be safely `include`d in QML files:

- [`QtQuick`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtquick-qmlmodule.html)
- [`QtQuick.Layouts`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtquick-layouts-qmlmodule.html)
- [`QtQuick.Particles`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtquick-particles-qmlmodule.html)
- [`QtQuick.Window`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtquick-window-qmlmodule.html)
- [`QtCanvas3D`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtcanvas3d-qmlmodule.html)
- [`QtGamepad`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtgamepad-qmlmodule.html)
- [`QtGraphicalEffects`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtgraphicaleffects-qmlmodule.html)
- [`QtMultimedia`](https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qtmultimedia-qmlmodule.html)
